page.title: 10CHURCH/STORES
page.content: {SAINT CHADS-CASTLE STREET THE VICAR IS REV.J.P DAVIES.THE BUILDING IS MADE OF SANDSTONE AND IT IS QUITE OLD.IT HOLDS REGULAR SERVICES AND ALSO HAS A SUNDAY SCHOOL. {THE CROSS STORES-CASTLE STREET GREENGROCERS.IT SELLS A LARGE VARIETY OF FOOD INCLUDING FROZEN FOODS AS WELL AS SWEETS,DRINKS AND ALOT MORE. {THE SUPERSTORE-CASTLE STREET THIS IS A HARDWARE STORE.IT IS OWNED BY MRS TREVOR AND SHE SELLS EVERYTHING EXCEPT FOOD AND DRINKS.SHE SELLS RECORDS,ORNAMENTS,etc. {OFF-LICENCE SELLS:- WINES,SPIRITS,CANS,SWEETS,CRISPS, {POST-OFFICE-CHURCH STREET IT SELLS GENERAL HOUSEHOLD GOODS.IT ALSO SELLS STAMPS AND ENVELOPES.HALF DAY CLOSING ON WEDNESDAY.
